name: SampleScene.Root
description:
SampleScene.Roots is an 3D Platformer Co-op game with the concept of "evolution of 3D game development". We describe the concept by showing character and scene environment details from basic 3D shape models that is the root of everything in to high-poly 3D models. This game is great for strengthening good relationships when play with your friends. Work with your friend as a partner and complete through 6 hardcore levels with many challenging and obstacles.

Game Programer : Nattapat Saipun

Game Designer : Kawin Chuangyanyong

3D Artist :Wasin Tanai , Krittin Kamkar , Chollasit Vibulsirikul

Game Sound Engineer : Posawat Jaroenpanit
